articles.title: Hierarchical dynamic coding coordinates speech comprehension in the human brain
articles.content:
Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Volume 122, Issue 42, October 2025.
SignificanceTo understand speech, the brain generates a hierarchy of neural representations, which map from sound to meaning. We recorded whole-brain activity while participants listened to audiobooks and modeled neural activity using time-resolved ...
